skins.selfIntroduction: I am Kagerou, the first ship of the Kagerou-class which was the first main-force destroyer to be designed under the Circle Three Plan after the Sakura Empire withdrew from the Washington Treaty! I'll have you know I am not the namesake of my class for nothing, and I will defend Destroyer Division Eighteen's glory!
skins.acquisition: I am Kagerou, first ship of the Kagerou-class! You appear to be a capable commander! We will sail together forever!
skins.login: Where am I from, and where will I go... Terribly difficult questions indeed.
skins.details: Grr~! Do not look at me so impudently! You're making me angry!
skins.secretaryIdle1: I'm bored~ I feel like going on a trip with my sisters?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hahahah~ You should take some time to properly reflect on your battles today~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Brighten up, Commander. I will be with you to the very end~
skins.secretaryTouch: Have you a need for me?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You've got quite some guts touching me like that, Commander...!

skins.shipDescription: The newly-retrofitted Kagerou has arrived~ I won't let that sister of mine pass me up anymore! Commander, lead us forward towards distant shores!
Commander, trick or treat! I expect you to give some candy to my sisters as well! These will-o'-wisps? Hahaha~ I tried imitating that gloomy sister of mine!
skins.acquisition: Commander, trick or treat! I expect you to give some candy to my sisters as well! These will-o'-wisps? Hahaha~ I tried imitating that gloomy sister of mine!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, come, let us go trick or treating!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'm working hard so that my sisters may eat the most delicious pumpkin around!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, surely tonight you will forgive any tricks played on you?
skins.secretaryTouch: A cannonball this is not, it is a will-o'-wisp!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I will cover my smokestack with this pumpkin, then... Ooh! Smoke is coming out of the pumpkin! Wait, what is that smell... Oh no! I burned the pumpkin!
